question:
Which among the following is/ are correct about the Paradip Port?
a) It is natural, deep water port
b) it is situated at the confluence of the Baitarani river
c) It is situated in Khardah district
Select the correct option from the codes given below
explanation: Paradip Port is a natural, deep water port, it is situated at the confluence of the Mahanadi river, It is situated in Jagatsinghpur district
